question: When did the Lead Bank Scheme reduce the developmental gap between different regions of the country launched in India?
option1: Towards the end of First Five Year Plan
option2: Towards the close of the Second Five Year Plan
option3: Towards the close of the Plan Holiday in Indian Economy
option4: Towards the end of the Eight Five Year Plan
answer: Towards the close of the Plan Holiday in Indian Economy
explanation: Lead Bank Scheme reduce the developmental gap between different regions of the country launched in India towards the close of the Plan Holiday in Indian Economy.
